trans-unit.source: Identifies the profile provider for a user-profile property.
trans-unit.target: 标识的配置文件提供程序的用户配置文件属性。

trans-unit.source: The ProfileProviderAttribute class is used to identify the profile provider for a property of a custom profile implementation.
trans-unit.target: ProfileProviderAttribute 类用于标识的配置文件提供程序实现的自定义配置文件的属性。

trans-unit.source: A custom profile implementation is a class that inherits from the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase> abstract class and defines properties for the user profile that are not specified in the configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 实现的自定义配置文件是继承自的类<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase>抽象类，并定义用户配置文件未指定配置元素中的属性。</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase>

trans-unit.source: You can specify a custom type for the user profile using the `inherits` attribute of the configuration element in the Web.config file for an application, as shown in the following example.
trans-unit.target: 你可以指定用户配置文件使用的自定义类型`inherits`的应用程序，如下面的示例中所示的 Web.config 文件中的配置元素的属性。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileProviderAttribute"></xref> class with the specified profile provider name.
trans-unit.target: 创建的新实例<xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileProviderAttribute"></xref>具有指定的配置文件提供程序名称的类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProviderAttribute> class is used to identify the profile provider for a property of a custom profile implementation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProviderAttribute>类用于标识的配置文件提供程序实现的自定义配置文件的属性。</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProviderAttribute>

trans-unit.source: A custom profile implementation is a class that inherits from the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase> abstract class and defines properties for the user profile that are not specified in the configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 实现的自定义配置文件是继承自的类<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase>抽象类，并定义用户配置文件未指定配置元素中的属性。</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase>

trans-unit.source: The name of the profile provider for the property.
trans-unit.target: 属性配置文件提供程序的名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the profile provider for the user-profile property.
trans-unit.target: 获取该用户配置文件属性配置文件提供程序的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the profile provider for the user-profile property.
trans-unit.target: 用户配置文件属性配置文件提供程序名称。
